title: Ep. 24: Let's Talk About Dogs
description:
Ep. 24: We discuss why we should take photos of everyday life; the tension that exists in love ("you're awesome" vs. "you can do better") -- and should my family get a dog?  Want to get in touch? @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/24; 774-277-9336
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Gretchen Rubin / The Onward Project
itunes:subtitle: Take Photos of Everyday Life, the Tension that Exists in Love–and Should I Get a Dog?
